Name: Battle Imagine - Brigand Scout Leader
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Brigand Scout Leader's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Blink Ambush.

Stunt! Blink Ambush
Summon Elite: Brigand Scout Leader and continuously attack the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Agility is increased for a period.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
